title: "AI lets you be Albert Einstein or the Mona Lisa on all your Zoom calls"
excerpt: "The software uses an already existing AI algorithm that had been developed to create animated videos. The AI was trained on a dataset of 12,331 short videos of people’s faces, which had been sourced from interviews uploaded to YouTube.
